Regulation Name(s): Herpes Virus Nucleic Acid-Based Cutaneous and Mucocutaneous Lesion Panel
Assayed external control material for microbiology nucleic acid amplification (NAT) assays
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Direct amplification without nucleic acid extraction
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for DiaSorin Molecular Simplexa VZV Swab Direct real-time PCR assay and positive control pack for qualitative detection of VZV DNA from lesion swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of varicella-zoster virus (VZV) DNA in cutaneous and mucocutaneous lesion swabs from patients with signs and symptoms of VZV infection as an aid in diagnosis; positive control pack for assay QC on the LIAISON MDX instrument.
